name: Zoek
description:
As a business owner there are not many things that want to pull your hair out as much as figuring out how to gain new customers, phone calls, and visitors to your website. Choosing a marketing company often seems nearly impossible with high costs and under performing firms diluting the market.
At Zoek we take a personalized, content driven approach to online visibility with a focus on diversification and analytics. We aim to deliver results and prove these results via weekly reports showing rankings and web traffic, review monitoring, call-tracking, and access to the MyZoek dashboard.
Zoek is a 14 time award winner of TopSEOs Industry Thought Leadership for the Local SEO and Mobile App Development categories. Zoek promises that if you start an SEO package that your business will be found on the Front Page of Google, Yahoo, Bing within 55 days or you don't pay.
READ MORE...
